wikipedia_page.main: Richard Mackney is an English journalist and broadcaster, probably best known as a reporter on ITV breakfast show, GMTV.

link_mentions.page: List of GMTV presenters and reporters

response: A short skit looking at a comedic or slapstick device, demonstrated by Dick and Dom (as the silent "Subject A" and "Subject B") with the aid of narrator, Richard Mackney.

In 1999 she joined News Direct 97.3, a rolling news radio station owned by ITN and based at Grays Inn Road in London. She has also hosted talk shows on LBC, both as sole host and as co-presenter with Nick Abbott, Richard Mackney, Mark Dolan and a former contestant on The Apprentice, Tre Azam. In 2005 Breathwick co-presented LBC News 1152 election coverage with veteran Sky News presenter Bob Friend (newscaster).
